flawed_nl_solution:
Jake weighs 8kg more than 52 kg which is 8+52 = <<8+52=60>>60 kg
Tracy and Jake together weigh 60+52 = <<60+52=121>>121kg
John therefore weighs 158-121 = <<158-121=37>>37 kg
The range of their weights is 60-37 = <<60-37=23>>23kg
#### 23

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 112, not 121. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
